titleStmt.title: Barneuels apology: or Holland mysterie· With marginall castigations.
Mysteria Hollandica. English
titleStmt.author: Oldenbarnevelt, Johan van, 1547-1619.
Holderus, Petrus.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by William Jones] for Thomas Thorp,

notesStmt.note: Translator's dedication signed by Robert Houlderus, i.e. Petrus Holderus, who also wrote the marginal reply.
Running title reads: Barneuelts apologie, with marginall castigations.
Variant: quire A in another setting, with title page line 1 reading "BARNEVELTS" and dedication signed "Houlders".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
